metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass the arm-ttk test, 'Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded'. Instead the `workspace-location` derived from the log analytics workspace is used.
Region where the Log Analytics workspace is located. Defaults to the resource group location.
The Log Analytics workspace name enabled for Microsoft Sentinel
Base URL for the Tropico backend API

connectorUiConfig.title: Tropico Security - Alerts
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest security alerts from Tropico Security Platform in OCSF Security Finding format.

instructionSteps.title: Connect Tropico Security Platform
instructionSteps.description: Enter your read-only API key from Tropico Settings.

connectorUiConfig.title: Tropico Security - Events
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest security events from Tropico Security Platform in OCSF Security Finding format.

instructionSteps.title: Connect Tropico Security Platform
instructionSteps.description: Enter your read-only API key from Tropico Settings.

connectorUiConfig.title: Tropico Security - Incidents
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest attacker session incidents from Tropico Security Platform.

instructionSteps.title: Connect Tropico Security Platform
instructionSteps.description: Enter your read-only API key from Tropico Settings.
